name: madotsuki's closet
description:
a four part bitsy game about yume nikki, madotsuki, and me.

learn what really happened to madotsuki as well as the true story of me becoming trans after reading yume nikki fan theories (yeah... ikr...)

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: just like the real yume nikki this game requires you set japanese applocale and- haha no i'm kidding. just extract the zip and run madotsukiscloset.html
